topics.body: Hey I just saw you on the front page of 4chan and I know a lot of guys are going to pounce on me for this but you really shouldn't come to this site and if you do especially not /b/. I only read some of the comments and it looks like you are taking it well but sometimes people post really bad stuff on here and I don't think you are ready for it. I have a lot of interest in curvy women and that's one of the reasons I come to 4chan. I don't think your honor based upbringing is really going to understand what the kids on this forum do. They are probably going to try to make you show your breasts (write stuff like Tits or GTFO) or something like that or post violent pics. Some people on here even joke about incest. I don't want to come off as lecturing you but I just don't know why you came here. Did some white guy you are dating tell you to come to this site? He probably thought it would be funny to see your reaction when people start posting things that you can't handle. I hope you take my advice, I don't really know what else to say except you might want to try /soc/ that is usually where the chill people hang out. I'm not just doing this because you are so pretty or something like that, I realize you are thousands of miles away and there isn't much of a chance that we could ever meet each other. I just want you to know that you deserve better than this site and whatever creepy white guy sent you here, you should be with someone that respects you and doesn't put you in an awkward position like this. I like 4chan and I like /b/ but I just don't want to see you get hurt here
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
So I've been playing civilization 5 the past couple of days and I have to be honest here: *I FUCKING HATE THIS GAME!*

I can't find anything wrong with the gameplay or such, but rather what I mean by this is that my problems with it summarized as succinctly is that the entire game seems to be designed by someone whose entire understanding of history only spans the past fifty years and it spilled over into how the game works; which is why I hate it cause for a game whose title is "civilization" that's a pretty big fucking oversight.

The bots act nothing like the supposed rulers they represent; the religions have no real difference gameplay wise from each other; the civilizations policies do not change according to their time or level of development.

Honestly it's probably one of the few games where less options would have been better.  For example if the rulers had pre-chosen religions that you would be assigned and that each religion had pre-chosen boosts and such according to their actual beliefs.  Also a good way to get past how the civilizations don't act like how their actual historical past selves would be for them each to have leaders from certain times to represent the countries.  Finally that for each era there are certain boosts/downsides that the player has to overcome; for example if a era in a country had massive famine then reduce production of food during that level of development.

It's a good game and that's why I fucking hate it cause the creators know nothing jon snow.  It's like playing a game featuring Hitler as the hero who uses giant robots to save the jews and then it slaps on "100% representative of actual history" to the title and constantly defends that title claiming that anyone who says otherwise is wrong; regardless of how good the game is that's a fucking pretentious title to slap on.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
